rows.label: qst201109_0010
rows.name: You came... Mikumari.

rows.label: qst201109_0020
rows.name: Yes, I came in full force.

rows.label: qst201109_0030
rows.name:
Because I've also become just a
little bit curious about you.

rows.label: qst201109_0040
rows.name:
You're different from
before after all...

rows.label: qst201109_0050
rows.name: You won't remember me...

rows.label: qst201109_0060
rows.name:
Even after seeing the antique
spear that Mikumari loved...

rows.label: qst201109_0070
rows.name:
Even after visiting the places
where we worked together...

rows.label: qst201109_0080
rows.name:
In the end, Mikumari couldn't
regain her memories.

rows.label: qst201109_0090
rows.name:
You're strangely obsessed
with my memories.

rows.label: qst201109_0100
rows.name: Why go to such lengths?

rows.label: qst201109_0110
rows.name:
I just wanted to live
with Mikumari again.

rows.label: qst201109_0120
rows.name: That was my only wish.

rows.label: qst201109_0130
rows.name: But...

rows.label: qst201109_0140
rows.name:
I realized in Superbia that a
lukewarm approach wouldn't work...

rows.label: qst201109_0150
rows.name: ...So this is the only way.

rows.label: qst201109_0160
rows.name:
A good decision, Seori. With
this, I can grant your wish.

rows.label: qst201109_0170
rows.name: You are...

rows.label: qst201109_0180
rows.name: From the Core Crystal hunters...

rows.label: qst201109_0190
rows.name:
It's been a while. I'm honored
that you remember me.

rows.label: qst201109_0200
rows.name: Well, from our side too...

rows.label: qst201109_0210
rows.name:
Mikumari's Driver was killed, and
most of our comrades were captured.

rows.label: qst201109_0220
rows.name: I've never forgotten about you.

rows.label: qst201109_0230
rows.name: Look at her...

rows.label: qst201109_0240
rows.name:
Because of you, my Seori has
become completely spiritless.

rows.label: qst201109_0250
rows.name:
So, to return her to her former self, I'd
like you to give Mikumari back to me.

rows.label: qst201109_0260
rows.name: You say whatever you please...

rows.label: qst201109_0270
rows.name: You're just useless without your Blade.

rows.label: qst201109_0280
rows.name:
Don't be ridiculous. I won't
become an ally to villains.

rows.label: qst201109_0290
rows.name:
Hey, hey, calling Seori, with whom
you were so close, a villain?

rows.label: qst201109_0300
rows.name:
When you're with a weak Driver, your
personality changes this much.

rows.label: qst201109_0310
rows.name: See, Seori?

rows.label: qst201109_0320
rows.name:
At this rate, Mikumari will be
ruined. Is that what you want?

rows.label: qst201109_0330
rows.name: Of course not.

rows.label: qst201109_0340
rows.name:
...I will kill that Driver
and take Mikumari back.

rows.label: qst201109_0350
rows.name:
Wait. Are you planning
to defeat Mikumari too?

rows.label: qst201109_0360
rows.name:
No, I will kill you all
and liberate Mikumari.

rows.label: qst201109_0370
rows.name: ...You, what have you been telling her?

rows.label: qst201109_0380
rows.name:
Don't say such unpleasant things.
I just told her the truth.

rows.label: qst201109_0390
rows.name: To get Mikumari back...

rows.label: qst201109_0400
rows.name:
You have to kill all of them,
get Mikumari's Core Crystal...

rows.label: qst201109_0410
rows.name: and then resonate with her again.

rows.label: qst201109_0420
rows.name: Don't be absurd. Blades are not objects.

rows.label: qst201109_0430
rows.name: That way is absolutely wrong.

rows.label: qst201109_0440
rows.name: Shut up, you brat.

rows.label: qst201109_0450
rows.name:
You can't get by in this world
with just pretty words.

rows.label: qst201109_0460
rows.name:
You've stolen plenty of Blades
yourselves, haven't you?

rows.label: qst201109_0470
rows.name: And Mikumari too.

rows.label: qst201109_0480
rows.name:
That's not the feeling
with which we resonate.

rows.label: qst201109_0490
rows.name: Do it, Seori. Kill them!

rows.label: qst201109_0500
rows.name: Stop.

rows.label: qst201109_0510
rows.name: Mikumari.

rows.label: qst201109_0520
rows.name: Stop it, Mikumari...

rows.label: qst201109_0530
rows.name:
For us to live together,
this is the only way.

rows.label: qst201109_0540
rows.name:
Please, just be still.
I'll free you soon.
